00020 /* include header defining the interface of the source. */
00021 #include "arithmetictools.h"
00022 
00023 /* check if double a is less than double b. */
00024 bool
00025 isLessThan(const double a, const double b) {
00026     return (b - a) > ((fabs(a) < fabs(b) ? fabs(b) : fabs(a)) * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
00027 }
00028 
00029 /* check if double a is greater than double b. */
00030 bool
00031 isGreaterThan(const double a, const double b) {
00032     return (a - b) > ((fabs(a) < fabs(b) ? fabs(b) : fabs(a)) * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
00033 }
